@graph.schema:name: Algorithm
@graph.schema:description: A finite sequence of rigorous instructions used for computation.

@graph.schema:name: Heuristic
@graph.schema:description: An approach to problem-solving that may not guarantee optimal results.

@graph.schema:name: Alan Turing
@graph.schema:description: Used human characteristics to describe machines.

@graph.schema:name: Social media recommender systems
@graph.schema:description: Systems relying on heuristics for recommendations.

@graph.schema:name: Finite sequence
@graph.schema:description: A sequence with a definite beginning and end.

@graph.schema:name: Rigorous instructions
@graph.schema:description: Precise and accurate instructions.

@graph.schema:name: Computation
@graph.schema:description: The process of mathematical calculation.

@graph.schema:name: Conditionals
@graph.schema:description: Statements controlling the flow of a program.

@graph.schema:name: Automated decision-making
@graph.schema:description: The process of making decisions by machines.

@graph.schema:name: Automated reasoning
@graph.schema:description: The process of drawing inferences by machines.

@graph.schema:name: Human characteristics
@graph.schema:description: Traits and attributes typically associated with humans.

@graph.schema:name: Memory
@graph.schema:description: The ability of a machine to store and retrieve information.

@graph.schema:name: Search
@graph.schema:description: The process of finding information.

@graph.schema:name: Stimulus
@graph.schema:description: An event or signal that elicits a response.

@graph.schema:name: Space
@graph.schema:description: The extent of area or volume.

@graph.schema:name: Time
@graph.schema:description: The indefinite continued progress of existence.

@graph.schema:name: Formal language
@graph.schema:description: A language with a precise syntax and semantics.

@graph.schema:name: Function
@graph.schema:description: A relation between a set of inputs and a set of possible outputs.

@graph.schema:name: Initial state
@graph.schema:description: The starting point of a process.

@graph.schema:name: Initial input
@graph.schema:description: The initial data provided to a system.

@graph.schema:name: Output
@graph.schema:description: The result produced by a process.

@graph.schema:name: Final ending state
@graph.schema:description: The concluding state of a process.

@graph.schema:name: Successive states
@graph.schema:description: The states a system passes through during its operation.

@graph.schema:name: Randomized algorithms
@graph.schema:description: Algorithms incorporating random input.
